title: Tuesday before Ash Wednesday (Shrove Tuesday)
antiphon: The Lord is full of compassion and mercy: Come let us adore him.

title: The Day of Pentecost
antiphon_mp: Alleluia. The Spirit of the Lord reneweth the face of the world: Come let us adore him. Alleluia.
antiphon_ep: Alleluia. The Spirit of the Lord reneweth the face of the world: Come let us adore him. Alleluia.
